categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Shane Rimmer (May 28, 1929 – March 29, 2019) was a Canadian actor who played the Rebel Crew Chief in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
He is perhaps best known for voicing the character of Scott Tracy in the TV series Thunderbirds, but has also appeared in the James Bond, Superman, and Batman film franchises.
